catalog_info.title: Mathematical Biology-Evolutionary Dynamics
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Mathematics 19a,b or 21a,b or 23a,b or 25a,b or 55a,b; or an equivalent background in mathematics.
catalog_info.description: Introduces basic concepts of mathematical biology and evolutionary dynamics: evolution of genomes, quasi-species, finite and infinite population dynamics, chaos, game dynamics, evolution of cooperation and language, spatial models, evolutionary graph theory, infection dynamics, somatic evolution of cancer.
